input: Jean and John were going to have a baby, and they are both in great shape. Jean and John are likely to have offspring in numbers that areGenotypes with greater fitness produce more offspring and pass more copies of their alleles to the next generation.

Kelly built a home with a gorgeous ocean view, but the hillside is prone to erosion, and each time it rains, his foundation becomes less stable. The slope is getting steeper and the water is flowing _____ causing more erosion.Water flowing over a steeper slope moves faster and causes more erosion.
Will draws some field lines very close to each other. This field is likelyThe closer the field lines are drawn together, the stronger the field being described.
Years from now, solar power will be _____ than it is today.Solar power is expensive, but as demand increases technology improves and costs decrease.

Dean wants to get a larger number of isomers to observe, so in order to do so quickly, he takes the number of carbon atoms in a hydrocarbon, and makes themAs you increase the number of carbon atoms in a hydrocarbon, the number of isomers quickly increases.

If Jim is comparing hydrocarbons and he finds one that has more carbon atoms, the number of isomers that hydrocarbon contains isThe more carbon atoms a hydrocarbon has, the greater the number of isomers.

When observing reactants and their particles, Shane decreases the temperature they're exposed to, noting that they now moveAt higher temperatures, particles of reactants have more energy, so they move faster.
When we look at the solar system planets are more far apartIn general, the farther away from the Sun, the greater the distance from one planets orbit to the next.
If we drop a big ball into a pool there will be _____ water shot out than a small ball.So more water is displaced by a bigger body than a smaller one.

If Mona lives in a country that doesn't get a lot of rain and it rains extra hard one day, what does that do to the water table?The water table is higher when there is a lot of rain and lower when the weather is dry.

Devon's cat, Fluffy, is looking for a nice warm spot to lay out in the sun. Because of how the sun heats the earth, and how some heat radiates into the air, the cat laying on the ground, rather than high up in a tree branch, would keep the catThe surface is heated by the Sun and some of that heat radiates back into the air. This makes the temperature higher near the surface than at higher altitudes.
If a particle were to cool down, it would have _____ energy.The higher the temperature, the more energy the particles have and the faster they will move and diffuse.
When someone never exercises they are _____ than those that work out a lot.Exercising muscles increases their size, and bigger muscles have greater strength.
What happens to John's risk of contracting a disease as he gets older?The older a person is, the greater their chance of developing a cardiovascular disease.
Compared to a box of bricks a box of feathers would beA given volume of a denser substance is heavier than the same volume of a less dense substance.

A ball that is on the top of the empire state building about to be dropped off will have _____ potential energy than a ball on the ground.So the higher an object is above a surface, the more potential energy it has.
